trans-unit.source: Represents a class that can read and write key identifiers, key identifier clauses, and security tokens.
trans-unit.target: Rappresenta una classe che può leggere e scrivere identificatori di chiave, clausole identificatore di chiave e i token di sicurezza.

trans-unit.source: Use the SecurityTokenSerializer class to read and write <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifier>, <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifierClause>, and <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken> classes as XML.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare la classe SecurityTokenSerializer per leggere e scrivere <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifier>, <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifierClause>, e <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken>classi come XML.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifierClause> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifier>

trans-unit.source: The SecurityTokenSerializer class has methods to determine whether this class can read and write these entities and to actually read and write them.
trans-unit.target: La classe SecurityTokenSerializer dispone di metodi per determinare se questa classe è possibile leggere e scrivere queste entità e per leggere e scriverli effettivamente.

trans-unit.source: For security tokens, these methods are <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer.CanReadToken%2A>, <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer.CanWriteToken%2A>, <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer.ReadToken%2A>, and <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer.WriteToken%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Per i token di sicurezza, questi metodi sono <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer.CanReadToken%2A>, <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer.CanWriteToken%2A>, <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer.ReadToken%2A>e <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer.WriteToken%2A>.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer.WriteToken%2A> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer.ReadToken%2A> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer.CanWriteToken%2A> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer.CanReadToken%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether this serializer can read the <xref uid="langword_csharp_<KeyIdentifier>" name="<KeyIdentifier>" href=""></xref> element referred to by the specified XML reader.
trans-unit.target: Determina se questo serializzatore può leggere il <xref uid="langword_csharp_<KeyIdentifier>" name="<KeyIdentifier>" href=""> </xref> elemento a cui fa riferimento il lettore XML specificato.

trans-unit.source: Classes that derive from the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer> class must override the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer.CanReadKeyIdentifierCore%28System.Xml.XmlReader%29> method.
trans-unit.target: Le classi che derivano dalla <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer>classe deve eseguire l'override di <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer.CanReadKeyIdentifierCore%28System.Xml.XmlReader%29>metodo.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer.CanReadKeyIdentifierCore%28System.Xml.XmlReader%29> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer>

trans-unit.source: The CanReadKeyIdentifier method calls the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer.CanReadKeyIdentifierCore%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Le chiamate al metodo CanReadKeyIdentifier il <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer.CanReadKeyIdentifierCore%2A>metodo.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer.CanReadKeyIdentifierCore%2A>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> to read the key identifier.
trans-unit.target: Un <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>per leggere l'identificatore di chiave.</xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> when the specified <xref uid="langword_csharp_<KeyIdentifier>" name="<KeyIdentifier>" href=""></xref> XML element can be read; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Quando specificato <xref uid="langword_csharp_<KeyIdentifier>" name="<KeyIdentifier>" href=""> </xref> elemento XML può essere letto; in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.target: readeris .

trans-unit.source: Determines whether this serializer can read a clause in a <xref uid="langword_csharp_<KeyIdentifier>" name="<KeyIdentifier>" href=""></xref> element referred to by the specified XML reader.
